detail_desc: T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Top in organic cotton jersey with short cap sleeves.
Faux fur gilet with side pockets and hook-and-eye fasteners at the front. Lined.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a yoke at the back, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and raw edges.

Set in soft cotton. Cardigan in sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, a print motif at the top, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Top in jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), long sleeves and a round, ribbed neckline. Dungarees in lightweight, patterned sweatshirt fabric with elastication at the back of the waist, straps with adjustable buttons at the front and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short jacket in a textured weave with raw, frayed edges, front pockets and no buttons. Lined.

Oversized top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a lined, drawstring hood. Low dropped shoulders, concealed pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in stretch, ribbed organic cotton jersey.
Playsuit in cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves, a round neckline and press-studs at the back. Side pockets and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow at the front.
Short, off-the-shoulder top in soft fabric with smocking at the top and hem, and long wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Short, fitted dress in soft jersey with mesh sections, a small stand-up collar and a small opening with buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves, and a double-layered lower section.
Cargo joggers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and flap back and leg pockets with press-studs. Fake fly, shaping seams at the knees and ribbed hems.
Cap in hard-washed cotton with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.

Short dress in airy plumeti chiffon with a wide drawstring neckline and long raglan sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and a seam with a flounce at the hem. Partly lined in jersey.
Fitted body in soft jersey with a wide neckline, 3/4-length sleeves and a lined gusset with concealed fasteners.
Waist bag in a sturdy weave with imitation leather details. Zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment, an inner compartment and adjustable waist strap with a plastic fastener. Size 3.5x13.5x28 cm.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned thermal fleece with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and raglan sleeves.
Wide resin bangle. Width 4 cm.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit premium cotton with a collar, V-neck and slits in the sides.
Net bag in braided paper straw with two handles at the top. Size approx. 40x45 cm.
Fully lined, patterned sports bikini. Top with a racer back and opening at the back. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and wide sides.
Long, 5-pocket denim shorts with a regular waist, zip fly and button, slightly lower crotch and slim legs.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Short-sleeved dress in soft cotton velvet with shimmering buttons at the back, a seam at the hips with a small frill trim, and a skirt in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Airy cotton poplin lining at the top.
Short-sleeved shirt woven in a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, French front and rounded hem. Slim Fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a slightly wider neckline and 3/4-length sleeves.

Imitation suede sandals decorated with sequins and faceted plastic beads. Adjustable ankle strap with elastic and a metal buckle, imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered block heels 5.5 cm.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with a low waist, wide sides, medium coverage at the back and folded, glued, scalloped edges.
V-neck T-shirts in organic cotton jersey.
Jumper in a soft knit with a ribbed polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Cropped T-shirt in cotton jersey with an embroidered motif at the top.
T-shirt in ribbed, patterned cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and overlocked edges at the sleeves and hem.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, loose knit with no buttons. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.
Microfibre bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and gently tapered legs with good room for movement over the thighs and knees.
A pair of twisted metal hoop earrings.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh-lined hood and zip down the front. Long raglan sleeves, front pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Wide, off-the-shoulder blouse in a crinkled weave with smocking and a small frill trim at the top and wide, 3/4-length trumpet sleeves.
Hard smartphone case in grained imitation leather and decorated with a metal ring that can be rotated through 360 degrees. Fits iPhone 6/6s/7/8.

Short, fitted cold shoulder dress in a crinkled weave with a sweetheart neckline and wide, elasticated shoulder straps. Short, double-layered puff sleeves with concealed elastication at the top and hems for added volume. Concealed zip at the back and gathered seams down the front and back for a softly draped effect. Lined.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft jersey.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, lightly padded cups and ties at the neck and back.

Suit trousers in woven fabric with an adjustable, elasticated waist with an extended waistband and hook-and-eye fastening. Zip fly, side pockets, fake welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases.
Cardigan in a soft, rib-knit wool blend with buttons made of shell down the front and long raglan sleeves.

V-neck jumpsuit in a linen and viscose weave with adjustable shoulder straps and a wide, detachable tie belt at the waist. Side pockets, a concealed zip in one side and wide, ankle-length legs. Lined at the top.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with an embroidery detail on the chest, a hood, front pockets and tie belt at the waist.
Short cycling shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Set with a hooded jacket and pair of trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend. Jacket with a zip down the front, chin guard, ribbing at the cuffs and hem and a jersey-lined hood with sewn-on ears at the top. Trousers with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Boots with padding around the top of the shaft and lacing at the front. Faux fur linings and insoles and chunky thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 4 cm.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves, press-studs down the front and along one leg, and ribbed cuffs and hems.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket woven in a linen blend with one button at the front, flap front pockets and an inner pocket. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.

Short, fitted dress in a stretch weave with short cap sleeves. Pleats at the front of the neckline and a zip at the back. Detachable belt with a covered metal buckle at the waist, and a slit at the back. Unlined.
5-pocket, ankle-length, slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details that are patched inside. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.

Padded outdoor trousers in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with a zip fly and hook and loop fastening, elasticated hems and an elastic strap under the feet. The trousers are in a slightly higher cut at the back with elastication at the waist and have elastic braces with a hook and loop fastening. Reflective details and a fleece lining. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Covered elastication at the waist and ribbed hems.
Body in jersey with a slightly wider neckline, short puff sleeves with gathered seams, and press-studs at the crotch.
Long-sleeved tops in ribbed organic cotton jersey.

ZlideOn zip tab to quickly repair a broken zip in your favourite garment. Can be used with plastic zips that are 6 mm wide when closed. These zips are often found in children’s clothes, all-in-one-suits and jackets. Remove the old zip tab and click on the ZlideOn tab.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with an intarsia motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit, pair of leggings, an all-in-one suit, a T-shirt and a hat in soft organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch. Leggings with a wide foldover waistband, elasticated heels and full feet. All-in-one suit with an all-over print, press-studs down the front and at the crotch, elasticated heels and full feet. T-shirt with a print motif on the front and lapped shoulders.
Long-sleeved dress in sweatshirt fabric with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Sleeveless body in jersey crêpe with a V-neck that has a decorative tie detail at the front, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and concealed press-studs at the crotch.

Ski mittens in windproof, water-repellent, functional fabric with folded seams, elastication at the wrists and top and reflective details. Plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the gloves together. Thinsulate™ lining. The mittens have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Vest top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey with a button placket.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Long-sleeved top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with press-studs on one shoulder, lapped ribbing at the neckline and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Thermal longjohns in functional fabric with an elasticated waist and keyhole fly.
Fitted, long-sleeved top in soft ribbed jersey.

Round-necked T-shirt in a soft cotton blend. The T-shirt incorporates COOLMAX® functional fabric, a unique, soft, comfortable and fast-drying polyester fibre that efficiently wicks moisture while regulating temperature.
Santa hat in woven fabric with reversible sequins. Trim and pompom in faux fur.
Jacket in soft faux shearling with jersey trims around the opening and pockets. Stand up collar, a zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves and front pockets. Unlined.
Long, thick socks in a jacquard knit with a pile lining.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Loose-fitting sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with a wide neckline, elastication at the top and decorative buttons at the front. Elasticated seam at the waist and a flounce at the hem.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Trousers in stretch washed twill with a high waist, zip fly with two buttons, back pockets and slim legs with decorative seams at the front.
